LanguageData.VWE_PitchSoakedTips.label: pitch-soaked tips
LanguageData.VWE_PitchSoakedTips.description: These projectiles have been dipped in sticky, flammable tar and wrapped in cloth. They have a high chance of igniting the target upon impact.
LanguageData.VWE_HighTensionLimbs.label: high-tension limbs
LanguageData.VWE_HighTensionLimbs.description: The limbs of this weapon are incredibly stiff, storing massive amounts of kinetic energy. It takes much longer to draw or crank, but the projectile flies faster and hits harder.
LanguageData.VWE_WhisperFletching.label: whisper fletching
LanguageData.VWE_WhisperFletching.description: The projectiles use soft, owl-down fletching that silences their flight. It generates almost no noise, preventing animals from fleeing when missed.
LanguageData.VWE_BarbedHeads.label: barbed heads
LanguageData.VWE_BarbedHeads.description: The projectiles are tipped with jagged, cruel hooks designed to tear flesh and get stuck in the wound. They cause immense pain and have higher stopping power.
LanguageData.VWE_QuickDrawString.label: quick-draw string
LanguageData.VWE_QuickDrawString.description: This bow is strung with a flexible, slightly slacker string. It allows for rapid volley fire at the cost of range and armor penetration.
LanguageData.VWE_TwinNock.label: twin-nock
LanguageData.VWE_TwinNock.description: This weapon is designed to fire two projectiles simultaneously. It creates a hail of arrows but makes aiming at specific targets much more difficult.
LanguageData.VWE_BluntHeads.label: blunt heads
LanguageData.VWE_BluntHeads.description: The projectiles are tipped with heavy, flat weights instead of sharp points. They deal blunt trauma, cracking bones and causing bruising rather than bleeding wounds.
LanguageData.VWE_SiegeAssembly.label: siege assembly
LanguageData.VWE_SiegeAssembly.description: This weapon is modified with heavy pulleys, a windlass, or reinforced laminate limbs, effectively turning it into a portable ballista. It hits with devastating force, capable of piercing thick armor, but the weapon is incredibly heavy and agonizingly slow to aim.
LanguageData.VWE_BlastTips.label: blast tips
LanguageData.VWE_BlastTips.description: The arrowheads are replaced with crude, volatile explosive charges. Upon impact, they detonate in a small radius, dealing significant damage to clusters of enemies. However, the heavy and unbalanced payload causes the projectile to tumble in flight, making accurate fire nearly impossible.
LanguageData.VWE_SlipString.label: slip-string
LanguageData.VWE_SlipString.description: This bow uses a specifically waxed, low-friction string. It allows the archer to hold extra arrows in their draw hand and loose them in a blur of motion. The hasty release prevents a full draw, limiting the weapon's effective range.
